original_title: The Psychedelic Furs: Live From House Of Blues
overview: Track Listing: India, Mr. Jones, Heaven, No Easy Street, Ghost In You, Alive, Love My Way, Wrong Train, Heartbreak, Beat, Sister Europe, Anodyne (Better Days), Only You & I (Angels), Into You Like A Train, Pretty In Pink, and Dumb Waiters
title: The Psychedelic Furs: Live From House Of Blues
